items.sentence: The children are sleeping. Please don\'t be so noisy.
I estimate that the work will cost more than $10,000.
I expect a subway station will be here in the future.
Tom started working for us when he was only thirteen.
Tom stayed with Mary and John when he visited Boston.
Tom stepped off the bus with a big smile on his face.
Tom stood on a chair so he could reach the top shelf.
Tom stooped to pick up a coin he saw on the sidewalk.
I want to know how many years you\'ve studied French.
I want to make sure I understand what you\'re saying.
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she needs to do that.
For once in my life, I\'d like to do something right.
Tom died because he had eaten some contaminated beef.
Tom flew to Boston to attend his daughter\'s wedding.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary means when she says that.
Mary\'s boyfriend is three years younger than she is.
Tom didn\'t even notice that Mary was looking at him.
Tom didn\'t give me a chance to explain what I meant.
Tom didn\'t have very many friends when he was young.
Tom didn\'t know how to do what Mary asked him to do.
